newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Ingersoll-Rand forms China joint venture.
newsitem.headline: Ingersoll-Rand forms China joint venture.

text.p: Ingersoll-Rand Co said on Monday it had formed a joint venture with Wuxi Boiler Works to manufacture road building equipment for use in China's growing general construction and infrastructure development industries.
The venture, to be known as Ingersoll-Rand (Wuxi) Road Machinery Co Ltd, will be 92 percent held by the U.S. industrial machinery maker and eight percent held by Wuxi Boiler.
The venture will be Ingersoll-Rand's second joint venture in Wuxi, in Jiangsu province, and its fourth overall in China.
